RELIGION

Selva Vinayagar Temple: Discourse on ‘Anmeega Jothidam’ by P.A. Ponniah, Railway Colony, 7.30 p.m.

Adi Chokkanathar Temple: Yagasala puja, 7 a.m.; mahakumbabishekam, 10 a.m.; tirukkalyanam, Sakkudi, 10.30 a.m.

Saiva Siddhantha Sabha: Discourse on ‘Tiruvarutpayan’ by A. Arumugam, South Adi Street, Meenakshi Sundareswarar Temple, 7 p.m.

Panniru Tirumurai Mandram: ‘Tiruvasagam’ mutrothal, 7 a.m.; Tiruppugazh recital, South Adi Street, Meenakshi Sundareswarar Temple, 6 p.m.

Tiruvalluvar Kazhagam: Discourse on ‘Tiruvarutpa’ by M. Vijayaraman, North Adi Street, Meenakshi Sundareswarar Temple, 7 p.m.

Tiruvalluvar Mandram: Discourse on ‘Sekkizhar Pillaithamizh’ by Arunachalam, Sakthi Velammal Nagar, S, S, Colony, 5 p.m.

Kamakoti Peravai: Maha Periyavar jayanthi; discourse by Dharani Vijay, Vasudhara, Tirupparankundram Road, Andalpuram, 6.15 p.m.

Bharathi Yuva Kendra Trust: Discourse on ‘Villi Bharatham’ by Tiruchi Kalyanaraman, Setupati Higher Secondary School, North Veli Street, 6.30 p.m.

Our Lady of Lourdes Church: 96{+t}{+h}annual festival; holy mass, Rev. Fr. Bernard leads, 6 a.m.; Rev. Fr. Mani Lazar leads, K. Pudur, 6 p.m.

CULTURE

Meenakshi Sundareswarar Temple: Anna memorial day; special prayer and community lunch; ‘ Sellur’ K. Raju, Minister for Cooperation, K. Veeraraghava Rao, Collector, S. T. K. Jakkaiyan, Tamil Nadu’s Special Representative in Delhi, and V.V. Rajan Chellappa, Mayor, participate, Tirukkalyana Mandapam, 12 noon.

International Sivananda Yoga Vedanta Centre: Yoga and meditation classes; 444 KK Nagar East Ninth Street, 6 a.m., 6.30 p.m., 10 a.m. and 4 p.m. (for women).

Prajapita Brahmakumaris Ishwariya Vishwa Vidyalaya: Free rajayoga meditation classes; 36 Meenakshi Nagar, P and T Nagar; 40 Sambandamoorthy Street; 47 B CMR Road and 357 Anna Nagar, 6.30 a.m. and 5.30 p.m.

Kadambavanam: Bharatanatyam, folk dance and puppet show, Parali, 6 p.m.

GENERAL

The American College: Centenary celebrations of Daniel Poor Memorial Library, 10 a.m.; release of Rotaract Club’s magazine, Tweets, Alumni Hall, 5 p.m.

Yadava College National Service Scheme: C. Dhanasekaran, Principal (in charge), inaugurates tuberculosis awareness camp, 2.30 p.m.

Capron Hall Higher Secondary School for Girls: 181{+s}{+t}anniversary celebration; A. Mercy Pushpalatha, Principal, Lady Doak College, addresses, 5.30 p.m.

Ponmani Matriculation Higher Secondary School: 27{+t}{+h}Annual Day; S. Raja addresses; K. John Moses, president, Bharathi Desiya Peravai, presides, Usilampatti, 5 p.m.

Evidence: Seminar on ‘Educational institutions and caste discrimination,’ Tamil Nadu Theological Seminary, Arasaradi, 4.30 p.m.

Nala Dental Hospital: Programme on ‘Recent advancements in root canal treatment using microscope,’ Chokkikulam, 11 a.m.

Alcoholics Anonymous: Meeting, AG Church, Melur, 6.30 p.m.; Deep Hospital and Loyola Technical Institute, Gnanaolivupuram, 7 p.m.
title: madurai today
